item.title: Customer Stories
item.description: Introduction Want to see how customers or partners have used with the Automation Kit? This page will reference public customer stories and feedback using the Automation Kit. Cineplex Read more on the Cineplex digital transformation with Power Automate RPA led by citizen developers story.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Register ðŸ“† Register for our office hours session https://aka.ms/ak4ppofficehours Tell Me More This meeting is a regular forum for customers and partners to learn and ask questions about the Automation Kit for Power Platform. Come prepared to ask questions about existing features, learn how something works and new features you’d like to see. Please note: This session will be attended by multiple customers and partners and will be recorded. Please state any questions with the appropriate level of detail for this broader audience.
